title: Bug 13189 - Refactoring deleting fields context menu is overridden by message dialog
description: When setting up JUnit on LinuxMotif and w2k, the context menu for deleting fields is not shown. Instead, a message dialog immediately asks if the getter/setter should be deleted as well.
OB: Before the bug, when right-clicking on 'fName' in the outliner of TestCase.java, a context menu should be shown.
EB: After the bug, no context menu is shown and a message dialog pops up asking if the getter/setter should also be deleted.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Enable the option 'Code Generator - Remove prefix from field names'
2. Open TestCase.java
3. In the outliner, right-click on 'fName'
